name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jerome Edward CLAIR.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jerome Edward CLAIR.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jerome Edward CLAIR.
No. D-2893.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 16, 2016.
Jerome Edward Clair, of Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
